website_summaries.verdict: Denon's AVR-E400 embodies some progress in simplifying the arduous AV receiver setup process, but it lacks convenient wireless features you'd expect at this price.
pros: The Denon AVR-E400 shows some real strides in making AV receivers easier to use, with an onscreen Setup Assistant, push-in speaker connectors, and a simpler remote
Its six HDMI inputs should be enough for nearly all home theaters, plus it has a respectable suite of streaming-audio services, including AirPlay, DLNA, Pandora, Spotify, and Internet radio
The AVR-E400 also offers the same solid sound quality we've come to expect from Denon
cons: There's no Bluetooth or Wi-Fi, which both offer a lot of convenience and are available on the less expensive Onkyo TX-NR626
The step-down AVR-E300 is also a better value for most buyers and includes all the new ease-of-use features
And the AVR-E400's bulky design is hard to overlook when Marantz's NR1403 is nearly half the size

customer_reviews.title: If It Were Really 185 Watts, You'd Be Paying a Whole Lot More
customer_reviews.text: 90 watts of continuous power. 185 watts is the peak power or dynamic headroom that comes into play when watching action films. You can verify the info on Denon wbsite. Type in the model number, look at the owner's manual, You'll have to scroll way down to specifications. Check the ohms rating of your speakers. Are they 8 or 6? I use it mostly for music and it sounds great. Yeah, they advertise 185 watt for the wow factor and it grabs your attention.
customer_reviews.author: madden2012

customer_reviews.title: Great sound again
customer_reviews.text: So happy with our sound system! Item arrived in its new original package! Thanks to this Vendor we have a working surround sound again!
customer_reviews.author: Sandak

customer_reviews.title: Great product from Denon, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a great receiver and was exactly what I needed for my home entertainment setup. I can run all of my devices through it (Blu-ray, HD antenna, Wii, Xbox, Chromecast) and have them spit out the HDMI to my TV and projector. It was simple to set up with clear menus. The network integration is awesome and I control it on my android phone with the Denon app most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Redding

customer_reviews.title: Really a great addition and replacement for my Yamaha for home theatre
customer_reviews.text: Really a great addition and replacement for my Yamaha for home theatre. The OSD for speaker setup and calibration of surround sound was so easy my wife could have completed it. I use the second zone for the speakers on my back patio with plenty of amp. The app for the Andrioid and iPhone really make it complete for a remote control on the wifi. The only problem I keep having is that when using Pandora it will just suddenly stop playing. I found a firmware update that was supposed to address this problem and I installed it but still continue to have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice receiver, good sound and lots of options. I bought it to use primarily for streaming music from my bluetooth phone/tablet and wifi. To get this to work, you need to hardware it to your computer via an Ethernet cable. Not what I wanted. It was listed as wifi and Bluetooth but not unless hooked up to your computer. Our stereo system is upstairs and wanted to keep from running up and down the stairs to adjust volume and sources. This item didn't fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: David Wallas

customer_reviews.title: If you hook it up as a 5.1 Setup!
customer_reviews.text: The automatic setup is easy. The only difficulty is that, if you hook it up 5.1, you have to attach the rear speakers to the surround outputs instead of to the rear speaker outputs. The Internet radio feature is fantastic!. It works well with the android app so that you can play with the internet station feature without turning on the tv set.
customer_reviews.author: maw

customer_reviews.title: Cannot complain
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I would say could be better, is they try to make the setup so flawless, that it's somewhat complicated. A big tip would be that if you set the speaker volumes with the microphone sensor, make sure it is dead silent. The microphone picks up EVERYTHING, and it will interfere. I would imagine it is a good thing, but made it a little more challenging than it should have been.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Nice AV RECEIVER
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty satisfied with this receiver. Has the features I wanted except wifi but all my other components have wifi and as soon as I move my router and modem across the room I will run a cat 5 cable to the back of the receiver and that will take care of the Internet connectivity issue. I like the 7.1 surround and the Audesey speaker set up. I am not too crazy about the remote that came with the receiver butay it just takes getting used to bit mp deducts for that.
customer_reviews.author: SecPro

customer_reviews.title: Great Receiver for the money
customer_reviews.text: I am running this receiver in a 7.1 home theater setup and it does all the decoding and amplification that I need. It replaced a high end AVR-4806CI model for comparison. It does up-scaling to 4K video to my Sharp TV and looks great. Highly recommended if you doesn't need WI-fi, otherwise you will need to purchase a WI-fi receiver for the Ethernet port. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Scarpitti

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this Denon 2 zone system.
customer_reviews.text: After suffering through the Onkyo HDMI blues, I went to Denon and am very happy. The vol. needs to be way up compared to my other system but is room filling and all I need to enjoy surround sound movies at home. The zone 2 was very important to me so I can run sound to the other rooms and decks. Everything works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B

customer_reviews.title: Good value, could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this receiver to replace my 7 year old Onkyo. It works good and sounds better that the Onkyo. I specifically bought this unit to use the Sirius Radio internet app. Sadly is does not function well with all the Time-outs and such from Sirius XM.
customer_reviews.author: MCPRO

customer_reviews.title: could not be happier!!!
customer_reviews.text: You can read the specs I don't need to tell you that this thing is awesome!!! Its one of the few receivers that has a 9 band graphic EQ that is nice to have along with the audessy sound stuff so it has tons of settings, the onscreen display is neat and clean and easy to navigate. The fact that it does 5.1 and zone 2 or 7.1 is also a nice feature along with SiriusXM being able to stream that sounds pretty dam good for streaming. Returned the Sony str dn840 for this and boy am I glad I did
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: It is so nice to be in the real HDMI Pass Through 7.1 World
customer_reviews.text: Had a Sony 5.1 system.. no HDMI pass through.. No sound through HDMI... So we got this Denon unit... WHAT A DIFFERENCE! Setup was a challenge, but quickly resolved. The sound through the HDMI and video are great. No synch issues! Really good purchase. AND.. The wife even appreciates the improved sound!
customer_reviews.author: RockyMT14

customer_reviews.title: One of the best bang for the buck in low cost audio receivers
customer_reviews.text: One of the best bang for the buck in low cost audio receivers. The quality you have come to expect from Denon, and very easy to use. This is ideal for folks with all HDMI, and little to no composite connectivity needs.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Finally  good working networked receiver
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the network feature. Works well with the ios Denon remote. I can listen to internet stations with my iphone as a remote. My hope is that they will continue to update us with new firmware like apple does.
customer_reviews.author: hingesnoot

customer_reviews.title: Received on time. The antenna seems to get interference ...
customer_reviews.text: Received on time. The antenna seems to get interference at times if it's too close to the receiver. Also wish it was a little more user friendly when using 2 different zones. Otherwise it does the job and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Denon receiver
customer_reviews.text: I have the Denon analog version that I bought 20 years ago. Just upgraded so far seem to be OK. I rated 4 stars because no WIFI. sound quality not better than my 20 year old model.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted in an AV receiver
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, sounds great. Hooked these up to my paradigm speakers and could'nt be happier. Replaced a very nice marantz with this Denon. Denon noticeably superior in so many ways.
customer_reviews.author: R E

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the sound and the user interface of this ...
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the sound and the user interface of this new unit. I'm not sure I needed to replace my old receiver but now that I have, I am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: P. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: great receiver, but I bought it as a refurb and it has several issues with it
customer_reviews.author: C.T.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Despite some negative reviews I bought this receiver/amp, it has performed flawlessly, it sounds better than my previous $700 Yamaha!
customer_reviews.author: Doug C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: absolutely perfect with the new system lots of HDMI connections easy hook up
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Gritzmacher

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I want at a great price. I highly recommend it. Only downfall is it does not have wireless connectivity - you must use an ethernet cable. Bummer

customer_reviews.title: Slow an buggy spotify an AirPlay implementations
customer_reviews.text: Also have problems with surround levels when using it with Verizon cable HD movies

customer_reviews.title: you haven't experienced surround sound until you've enjoyed this thing
customer_reviews.text: OMG, you haven't experienced surround sound until you've enjoyed this thing. a must have for all surround sound enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: The ability to control receiver with iPad, Windows Surface tablet and Android phone is all I need. Awesome.

customer_reviews.title: Denon 400
customer_reviews.text: Lots of options and features. Good value I needed a receiver as my samsung tv only had 1 audio output!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Returned refurbished with tech support could not get it working
customer_reviews.author: Rheeanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice av
customer_reviews.text: So far works great. But it does get really hot. I have good ventilation and it still gets hot. Hope it does not shorten life span.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME AV AMP/REC
customer_reviews.text: Great Av Rec. Plenty of power, can run several speakers and easy to use both zones
customer_reviews.author: JUSTIN MUDD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: I find this receiver extremely disappointing compared to my old-school units. I don’t know how the 185 watts per channel is measured. But, it doesn’t deliver! Lots of whistles and bells, short on true performance. I won’t buy Denon again, and will go back to old –school receivers and amplification at some point.
customer_reviews.author: BiroBooks

customer_reviews.title: Decent AVR
customer_reviews.text: I had a Harmon Kardon higher dollar AVR that I thought was going bad..turned out it was the settings on my Directv DVR...but this is 8 years newer, has plenty of HDMI ports, but a much less quality box than my old one..works well enough, dont see it adjusting the volume for commercials when the blare, and it says it does..not sure if that a good part. Overall easy to set up it does sound ok...I dont think anyone who just wants decent surround for their living room would be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K Mustain

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Some difficulties with setup
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Some difficulties with setup, but overall pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Marcello Cherchi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sound and fidelity... power could be higher and box smaller, but price and quality are OK
customer_reviews.author: manlio lopez

customer_reviews.title: Another great Denon product
customer_reviews.text: Another great Denon product! Setup was easy. Airplay and the internet radio functions work very well! Good power and great sound. The iphone app is in need of an update.
customer_reviews.author: That_Dude

customer_reviews.title: First of all great service from Amazon and the vendor
customer_reviews.text: First of all great service from Amazon and the vendor. Receiver was easy to hook up and calibrate.sound is absolutely incredible no lie. no need for Wi-Fi because it plays music through my AppleTV easy breezy. Major part that I didn't realize was that now the receiver handles all the input switching.this makes switching from one device to another incredibly fast and simple. I would recommend this to anyone in the market for a new receiver.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Denon E-400
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Denon E-400, did a ton of research b4 purchasing. Had everything I was looking for at a great price with awesome power!.......too bad is no longer available, got replaced with the AVR-900.....not even close, more like a down grade!

customer_reviews.text: Replaced my AVR-888 with this model. It has everything I need, but I really like the WiFi control.

customer_reviews.title: Denon AVR-E400
customer_reviews.text: Great product I upgraded for the wireless capability and it hooked up easily and was easy to use. I use it as surround and to power 6 speakers in three rooms.

customer_reviews.title: Set up is easy, calibration produced a rich surround sound experience
customer_reviews.text: Basically plug and play. Set up is easy, calibration produced a rich surround sound experience. I would highly recommend this amp.

customer_reviews.text: Well worth the cost, upgraded features are easy to set up and use. Would recommend it for those who like update equipment, with lesser electronic experience.

customer_reviews.title: More for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Love this receiver! The hdmi fixed the problem I had with the hdmi ports on my TV. Since hooking up this receiver, I've had no problems.

customer_reviews.title: first one I ordered from another source was substituted and ...

customer_reviews.text: This is one great receiver I can listen to music on line and the sound is amazing. Also with the phone app I can control the receiver with out any hesitation.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I'm not the most tech savvy so it ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it for two months. So far so good. I'm not the most tech savvy so it may take a while before I can say everything works.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Did not use the audyssey set up, I did it manually.

customer_reviews.title: great receiver, easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: bought it for thanks giving its been a great receiver, easy and quick to setup, great output for the price. calibration was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kenney

customer_reviews.title: High Tech and Sounds Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Ran the room setup for my 7.1 JBL system using the setup Mic and the speakers sound 100% better. It picked up that I had the speakers out of phase and once I switched the + and - the sound was just amazing. I also downloaded the Denon App for my iphone and I am able to turn on my unit, browse internet radio, and select my sources from anywhere in my home. This is a great receiver and HDMI switcher.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Forton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Got it for 299 from Amazon. Great audio quality and Its way easy to setup. Easy to control with ipad remote.
customer_reviews.author: Kathiresan Selvaraj

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome receiver. There are a few nuances and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome receiver. There are a few nuances and the 2nd zone is a bit difficult to control as the smart phone / tablet app isn't great (it is very laggy). However, it's easy to install and the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Taglieri

customer_reviews.title: Great sound through my old speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Will be buying Denon products from now on. Easy set up. Had a operator malfunction when it came to assigning the inputs to my DVD player so i could use it for my 'Area 2" but other than that ok.
customer_reviews.author: Digby In FL

customer_reviews.title: Product isn't what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I am pretty disappointed with this receiver. I have and always will use Pioneer but ordered this for a friend. This receiver does it's job yet is lacking in it's built in speaker calibration tool. It might be that it just needs to be updated as I have not hooked it up to the internet and check for software/firmware updates. I will put in a better review after I've had a chance to play with it a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: SleepWalker

customer_reviews.title: NO TV PICTURE
customer_reviews.text: No install CD, NO PAPER, CAN'T GET ANY SCREE N IMAGE
customer_reviews.author: Todd Kistler

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Power is nowhere even close to what's advertised. I search for months before I buy a receiver. I'm disappointed because I did not look for a pre amp out because I assumed denon would always incorporate this on any line of they're receivers. So because of this I cannot run another amp to get decent power to my speakers. I am running klipsch towers in front, center and 3 way surrounds. These are exceptionally good speakers for home theatre. I have to turn the receiver to almost 80% volume to hear them decently for a movie and this receiver still does not deliver the quality sound I need... Very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: cheryl baca

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This product is much better than the Pioneer unit it replaced. It's an overall good value for the performance. I would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.text: AWFULL PRODUCT, MANUFACTURER IS LYING ABOUT TWO ZONES...THAT IS NOT TRUE- JUST 1 ZONE...DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT IF YOU NEED TWO ZONES...
customer_reviews.author: Anton Zubatov

customer_reviews.title: Not all of the speakers will work at the same time in the correct ports
customer_reviews.text: Not all of the speakers will work at the same time in the correct ports. This is the 3rd receiver I've gotten from them, none have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Shimanek

product_meta.title: Denon AVR-E400 7.1 Integrated Network AV Surround Receiver with Airplay
feature_bullets: 7.1 channel; 185 watts per channel maximum power; analog to HDMI video conversion
New setup assistant with enhanced GUI
Amplified multi zone/multi source in lieu of surround back
